title: The Heist
description: Bored of life and tired of being down on his luck, Eddie Smith gathers his not-so-merry men for one last heist.If tempers arenâ€™t frayed enough as the has-beens dust off their stocking masks and plan the raid of a lifetime, a surprise appearance from a skeleton in the cupboard threatens to throw a spanner in the works.A hilarious stage play in two acts
author: Jo  Smith
